channel.title: Royal
channel.description: RoyalStore - more than just a theme

item.title: Travel one page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1405928577920{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}" bg_type="theme_default" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(50%, #E3E3E3), color-stop(100%, #C2C2C2));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" bg_override="0" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Our Agency

We are committed to offering travel services of the highest quality, combining our energy and enthusiasm, with our years of experience. Our greatest satisfaction comes in serving large numbers of satisfied clients who have experienced the joys and inspiration of travel.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type="space" height="20"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][bsf-info-box icon_type="selector" icon="Defaults-thumbs-up" img_width="48" icon_size="32" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_style="advanced" icon_color_bg="#f2951d" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="100" title="Trust" read_more="title" link="url:%23||" read_text="Read More" hover_effect="style_3" pos="top"]We take care of you before, during and after your vacation, during hurricanes, strikes and snowstorms.[/bsf-info-box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][bsf-info-box icon_type="selector" icon="Defaults-user" img_width="48" icon_size="32" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_style="advanced" icon_color_bg="#f2951d" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="100" title="Knowledge" read_more="title" link="url:%23||" read_text="Read More" hover_effect="style_3" pos="top"]We have experts in our business on every vacation and destination. We can find out everything you need to know.[/bsf-info-box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][bsf-info-box icon_type="selector" icon="Defaults-search" img_width="48" icon_size="32" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_style="advanced" icon_color_bg="#f2951d" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="100" title="Value" read_more="title" link="url:%23||" read_text="Read More" hover_effect="style_3" pos="top"]We have deals and vacation packages that you won’t get anywhere else.We plan your vacation at no extra cost.[/bsf-info-box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][bsf-info-box icon_type="selector" icon="Defaults-money" img_width="48" icon_size="32" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_style="advanced" icon_color_bg="#f2951d" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="100" title="Price Guarantee" read_more="title" link="url:%23||" read_text="Read More" hover_effect="style_3" pos="top"]While other travel agencies and websites claim to have the lowest prices, our specialists will go on further for you.[/bsf-info-box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type="image" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(50%, #E3E3E3), color-stop(100%, #C2C2C2));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);" parallax_style="vcpb-vz-jquery" bg_image_new="18508" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control" bg_override="full" css=".vc_custom_1405933567291{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]
Go round the World

Choose best quality

Our Travel Consultants have the professional expertise and the personal experience necessary to make your next vacation the unique and unforgettable experience you deserve.

Buy Royal      Read More

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1405931453096{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" bg_type="theme_default" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(50%, #E3E3E3), color-stop(100%, #C2C2C2));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control" bg_override="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Don`t dream it just live it

Whether you want to go to Europe, Asia, the South Pacific, Australia, Africa, South America, the Caribbean or somewhere closer to home, we have the industry relationships to provide you with the best options, at the best prices, with the greatest added value to help you reach your final destination.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="16282" img_size="full"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Our goal is to brand ourselves as providers of the ultimate travel planning experience while becoming a one stop shop for every travel service available in the industry.

Cruises, Spas, Ski Holidays, Private Islands, River Barges, All-Inclusive Resorts, Safaris, Family Vacations, Luxury Escapes and Honeymoons -these are only some of the many adventures we can help you plan.

Company Mission Statement

We believe that the key of success lies in nurturing vendor, employee, partner, and client relationships and establishing a positive work environment conveying happiness for our team and clients all throughout.

[/vc_column_text][vc_progress_bar values="70|CORPORATE,40|VACATION,90|SPACE TRAVEL"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1405931467178{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #fafafa !important;}" bg_type="grad" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(100%, #FAFAFA));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#FAFAFA 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#FAFAFA 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#FAFAFA 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#FAFAFA 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#FAFAFA 100%);" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control" bg_override="full" el_class="bordered"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Our Partners

Our trusted partners help our travel agents provide you with above and beyond travel experiences. We have spent years building valuable relationships with our partners in the travel industry including cruise lines, tour operators, hotels, car rental companies and more.

[/vc_column_text][brands display_type="grid" columns="4" order="DESC" number="4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type="image" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(50%, #E3E3E3), color-stop(100%, #C2C2C2));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_new="18527" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control" bg_override="full" css=".vc_custom_1405932115232{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_class="cta-block-travel2"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_cta_button style="without-border" position="right" title="Read more" href="#"]

Last minute offer

5 days, Rio de Janeiro to Rio de Janeiro from $568

Get to know the incredible sights of the "cidade maravilhosa" on this overview of incomparable Rio, including must-sees like Corcovado with its famous Christ the Redeemer statue—one of the new Seven Wonders of the World—and a trip up Sugar Loaf Mountain with incredible views back at the Rio skyline.

[/vc_cta_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1405936120172{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;}" bg_type="theme_default" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(50%, #E3E3E3), color-stop(100%, #C2C2C2));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control" bg_override="0" el_class="offer-slider"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Hot Travel Deals

From New York to New Zealand, we have a range of brilliant offers and deals to tempt every traveller; cheap flights, tour discounts, hotel freebies plus lots more!

[/vc_column_text][etheme_products type="slider" style="advanced" limit="4" desktop="2" notebook="2" tablet="2" phones="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type="bg_color" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(50%, #E3E3E3), color-stop(100%, #C2C2C2));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);" bg_color_value="#fafafa" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control" bg_override="full" css=".vc_custom_1405936156726{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_class="bordered"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Special Offers

Luxury doesn’t have to come at a high price. So, we have put together the greatest offers from our member properties around the globe. Though the hotels on offer may change, the offers will always be available.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class="bordered-table"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][ultimate_pricing design_style="design02" color_scheme="custom" package_heading="Cascais, Portugal" package_sub_heading="Hotel Quinta da Marinha Resort" package_price="$155" package_unit="3 days" package_btn_text="BOOK NOW" color_bg_highlight="#eb9a1c" color_bg_main="#fafafa" color_txt_main="#535353"]
  • Access to the Health Club with sauna, Turkish bath, indoor swimming pool.
  • Buffet breakfast
  • Outdoor Pool
  • Air Conditioned Rooms
  • Room Tv Movie System
  • Outdoor Pool
[/ultimate_pricing][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][ultimate_pricing design_style="design02" color_scheme="custom" package_heading="Funchal, Madeira, Portugal" package_sub_heading="VIDAMAR RESORTS MADEIRA" package_price="$206" package_unit="5 days" package_btn_text="BOOK NOW" color_bg_highlight="#a3b90d" color_bg_main="#fafafa" color_txt_main="#535353"]
  • Free use of tennis court, squash court, table tennis and billiards. Free parking
  • Half board with Dine Around concept
  • Free 25 minutes massage for the adults
  • Air Conditioned Rooms
  • 1 stand up paddle experience - half day
  • Access to Thalassotherapy Centre
[/ultimate_pricing][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][ultimate_pricing design_style="design02" color_scheme="custom" package_heading="Talloires, French Alps, France" package_sub_heading="Abbaye de Talloires" package_price="$368" package_unit="5 days" package_btn_text="BOOK NOW" color_bg_highlight="#03b4ea" color_bg_main="#fafafa" color_txt_main="#535353"]
  • 3 course dinner "Instant Gourmand" with cheese included .
  • Free access to the Jacuzzi and Sauna
  • 20% discount on all beauty treatments
  • Air Conditioned Rooms
  • 1 visit to the "Prior Room"
  • Outdoor Pool
[/ultimate_pricing][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1405934868114{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;}" bg_type="image" bg_grad="background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #FBFBFB), color-stop(50%, #E3E3E3), color-stop(100%, #C2C2C2));background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);background: linear-gradient(top,#FBFBFB 0%,#E3E3E3 50%,#C2C2C2 100%);" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_new="18551" bg_image_repeat="no-repeat" bg_image_size="cover" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control" bg_override="full"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Find Your Perfect Hotel

We represent some of the finest four and five star luxury hotels and resorts wordwide, each chosen for its outstanding levels of comfort, luxury and attention to detail as well as location and facilities.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][stat_counter icon_type="selector" icon="icomoon-uniF5CE" img_width="48" icon_size="40" icon_color="#eb9a1c" icon_style="none" width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Latest from the blog

Our program brings you weekly featured deals, bonus commissions, and the latest trips. Keep yourself educated on the latest vacation information for exciting destinations both domestic and international.

[/vc_column_text][vc_posts_grid grid_columns_count="3" pagination="hide" grid_content="teaser" posted_block="show" hover_mask="show" grid_layout="thumbnail_title_text" grid_template="grid" order="DESC" grid_posttypes="post" grid_teasers_count="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row font_color="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1405936545479{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_sense="30" bg_override="0" viewport_vdo="viewport_play" enable_controls="display_control"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Get in touch with us

You may want to consult individually with one of our experts to ensure that you are booking the best options for your trip. Every request/reservation is handled personally by one of our expert luxury travel advisers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type="space" height="20"][ultimate_google_map width="100%" height="350px" map_type="ROADMAP" lat="18.591212" lng="73.741261" zoom="12" scrollwheel="disable" streetviewcontrol="false" maptypecontrol="false" pancontrol="false" zoomcontrol="false" zoomcontrolsize="SMALL" marker_icon="default" top_margin="page_margin_top" map_override="full"][/ultimate_google_map][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_text_separator title="Our office" title_align="separator_align_left" color="black"][vc_column_text]We are well traveled and have been through intensive training, which means we match the right vacation to each customer. Whether you're new to the travel industry, or you're a travel industry professional looking for an exciting new career opportunity, we encourage you to submit your application.[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title="Address details" title_align="separator_align_left" color="black"][vc_column_text]300 Princess Road London, GreaterLondon,United Kingdom +44 123456789 suport@royal.com www.royal.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_text_separator title="Contact form" title_align="separator_align_left" color="black"][vc_column_text][contact_form class="compressed"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Footer travel one

item.content:encoded:
